description: Synthetic canary definitions for continuous LLM quality monitoring. Each canary defines a synthetic prompt+intent pair that runs periodically through the evaluation pipeline to detect regressions.

canaries.description: Morning briefing with inbox, priorities, and calendar
canaries.synthetic_prompt: Generate a morning brief for Clint. He has 4 unread emails (1 urgent from counsel), 2 meetings today (10am closing call, 2pm board prep), and 3 open action items from yesterday.

canaries.description: End-of-day digest with completed, pending, and tomorrow prep
canaries.synthetic_prompt: Generate an end-of-day digest. Completed: reviewed Fund II docs, sent compliance response. Pending: investor memo awaiting Isaac's review. Tomorrow: board deck finalization due before 2pm.

Extract commitments from: Isaac said 'I will send the updated Q4 numbers by Tuesday.' Clint replied 'I will review the closing docs by tomorrow morning and send comments.'

canaries.description: Deal snapshot with status and summary
canaries.synthetic_prompt: Generate a snapshot for deal fund-ii-2024 (Olumie Fund II). Status: active, closing docs under review, target close next week. Last touch: yesterday.

canaries.description: Improvement proposal with problem, change, and evidence
canaries.synthetic_prompt: Propose an improvement: The triage classifier has a 15% misclassification rate on facility alerts vs deal updates. Suggest adding entity-type feature to the classification prompt. Evidence: 8 misclassifications in the last 7 days.
Create a GTD action: Draft response to counsel about Fund II wire instructions. Context: @computer, project: Olumie Fund II Closing, energy: high, estimated 20 minutes.

canaries.description: Facility alert with type, severity, and description
canaries.synthetic_prompt: Generate a facility alert: Everest Healthcare main facility has an annual compliance filing due in 5 days. The filing template is 70% complete. Severity: high.
Track a waiting-for item: Waiting on Isaac for updated Q4 financials for the Everest board deck. Requested 2 days ago, expected by tomorrow. Status: pending.
